Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: In these peopleâ€™s digital rants we find various voices vying for attention on issues that include upcoming budget projections tax-cuts and welfare relief. The rental crisis is also discussed as is the inability of health promotion to illustrate their worth accurately. Some tweets direct their angst toward political figures and their policies and others ruminate on the power and implications of seemingly dire economic decisions. These loud and sometimes angry posts reflect the tensions and anxieties experienced by people who are all impacted differently by economic policies.
